definitions.definition: A discourse in which a question is discussed , or weighed and examined .
A kind of rhetoric employed in proving a thing and convincing others of its truth, in order to persuade them to adopt it. (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: A discourse in which a question is discussed , or weighed and examined .
secondary_definitions: A kind of rhetoric employed in proving a thing and convincing others of its truth, in order to persuade them to adopt it. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
